quotes.quote: Hello, inner child, I'm the inner babysitter.
It is a curious fact that small boys are more terrified of their babysitters than small girls are.
Some parents sometimes use junk food as a babysitter.
I need someone to be there 100% of the time. He thinks that's love. It's not love - it's babysitting.
I'm not quite sure how I would do babysitting.
I grew up babysitting and always enjoyed it.
When you're babysitting a kid, all you're seeing is a version of them, a small dosage.
I would rather be a babysitter than a nursemaid.
I guess babysitters are like used cars. You never really know what you're getting.
A babysitter is a teenager acting like an adult while the adults are out acting like teenagers.
Video games and computers have become babysitters for kids.
It is a little ironic that one thing a babysitter should not do is sit on a baby.
Bribes and boybands. That's all you need to be a babysitter.
The best baby-sitters, of course, are the baby's grandparents. You feel completely comfortable entrusting your baby to them for long periods, which is why most grandparents flee to Florida.
